languages.text: "Тише". {n}Голос Арлекина звучит спокойно, но это вовсе не просьба.{/n} "Я не удивлен, что правда сокрыта от ваших глаз, трехокие мон-кай, что зрят Ша'эиль. Я понял об этом, когда только встретил первых из вас. Убогих. Молящих о помощи в борьбе со своими же собратьями. Я почувствовал это в вас — зов наших предков. Мольбы о помощи. Бесконечные страдания. Я знал, что вы нашли Первый Мир. И смиренно ждал дня, когда вы приведете меня к нему".

traits.locale_text: "Тише". {n}Голос Арлекина звучит спокойно, но это вовсе не просьба.{/n} "Я не удивлен, что правда сокрыта от ваших глаз, трехокие мон-кай, что зрят Ша'эиль. Я понял об этом, когда только встретил первых из вас. Убогих. Молящих о помощи в борьбе со своими же собратьями. Я почувствовал это в вас — зов наших предков. Мольбы о помощи. Бесконечные страдания. Я знал, что вы нашли Первый Мир. И смиренно ждал дня, когда вы приведете меня к нему".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."
languages.original_text: "Тише". {n}Голос Арлекина звучит спокойно, но это вовсе не просьба.{/n} "Я не удивлен, что правда сокрыта от ваших глаз, трехокие мон-кай, что зрят Ша'эиль. Я понял об этом, когда только встретил первых из вас. Убогих. Молящих о помощи в борьбе со своими же собратьями. Я почувствовал это в вас — зов наших предков. Мольбы о помощи. Бесконечные страдания. Я знал, что вы нашли Первый Мир. И смиренно ждал дня, когда вы приведете меня к нему".

traits.locale_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is calm, but he is hardly requesting.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first few of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you — our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day when you would bring me to it."

I realised it the moment I met the first few of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「静かに」{n}ハーレクィンの声色には穏やかだが、要求ではない。{/n}「君たちの目から真実が隠されていても、僕は驚かないよ、シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目モン＝ケイ。君たちの最初の人に会った瞬間気づいたんだ。哀れだね。君の同胞を壊すのを手伝うよう、僕らに乞うなんてさ。君の中に感じたよ、僕らの父祖の呼び声を。懇願を。終わらない苦痛を。君が老朽惑星で見つけたものを知ってるから、君が僕を案内してくれる日を大人しく待っていたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."

traits.locale_text: 「静かに」{n}ハーレクィンの声色には穏やかさがあり、そこまで強い要求でもない。{/n}「君たちの目から真実が隠されていても、僕は驚かないよ、シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目モン＝ケイ。君たちの最初の数人に会った瞬間気づいたんだ。哀れだね。君の同胞を壊すのを手伝うよう、僕らに乞うなんてさ。君の中に感じたよ、僕らの父祖の呼び声を。懇願を。終わらない苦痛を。君が老朽惑星で見つけたものを知ってるから、君が僕を案内してくれる日を大人しく待っていたんだ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “安静。”{n}丑角的语气很平静，但充满了命令的意味。{/n}“你们这些三眼猴子能看到纱芮尔，因此你们看到了真相，我也并不意外。当我第一眼见到你们的时候，我就意识到了这一点。你们这些可怜虫，你们乞求我们，要我们帮忙消灭你们自己的同胞。我早就在你们体内感觉到了我们先祖的呼唤。我听到了他们的恳求，感觉到了他们无尽的折磨。我早就知道，你们找到了一个老妪世界。于是我谦卑地等待着，等待你们为我指路的时刻。”
languages.original_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."

traits.locale_text: “安静。”{n}丑角的语气很平静，但充满了命令的意味。{/n}“你们这些三眼猴子能看到纱芮尔，因此你们看到了真相，我也并不意外。当我第一眼见到你们的时候，我就意识到了这一点。你们这些可怜虫，你们乞求我们，要我们帮忙消灭你们自己的同胞。我早就在你们体内感觉到了我们先祖的呼唤。我听到了他们的恳求，感觉到了他们无尽的折磨。我早就知道，你们找到了一个老妪世界。于是我谦卑地等待着，等待你们为我指路的时刻。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Silence, » {n}intervient l'Arlequin sur un ton calme, mais ne laissant place à aucune discussion.{/n} « Cela ne me surprend pas que vous soyez incapables de voir la vérité, mon-keigh à trois yeux qui pouvez voir dans le Sha'eil. Je m'en suis rendu compte dès notre première rencontre. Vous n'étiez que des misérables venus supplier que l'on vous aide à anéantir vos semblables. Je l'ai senti en vous : l'appel de nos ancêtres. Leurs supplications. Leur tourment éternel. Je savais que vous aviez trouvé un monde déchu. Alors, j'ai pris mon mal en patience dans l'espoir que vous finiriez par m'y mener. »
languages.original_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."

traits.locale_text: « Silence, » {n}intervient l'arlequin sur un ton calme, mais ne laissant place à aucune discussion.{/n} « Cela ne me surprend pas que vous soyez incapables de voir la vérité, mon-keigh à trois yeux qui pouvez voir dans le Sha'eil. Je m'en suis rendu compte dès notre première rencontre. Vous n'étiez que des misérables venus supplier que l'on vous aide à anéantir vos semblables. Je l'ai senti en vous : l'appel de nos ancêtres. Leurs supplications. Leur tourment éternel. Je savais que vous aviez trouvé un monde déchu. Alors, j'ai pris mon mal en patience dans l'espoir que vous finiriez par m'y mener. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Silencio». {n}El tono del Arlequín es tranquilo, pero no deja lugar a protestas ni negativas.{/n} «No me sorprende que la verdad escape a vuestra mirada, mon-keigh de tres ojos que ven el Sha'eil. Lo comprendí en cuanto me encontré con los primeros de los vuestros. Miserables. Rogándonos ayuda para destruir a los vuestros. Sentí en vuestro interior la llamada de nuestros ancestros. Sus súplicas. Su tormento eterno. Sabía que lo que habíais encontrado era un mundo ancestral, y esperé con humildad al día en que me condujerais hasta él».
languages.original_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."

traits.locale_text: «Silencio». {n}El tono del Arlequín es tranquilo, pero no deja lugar a protestas ni negativas.{/n} «No me sorprende que la verdad escape a vuestra mirada, mon-keigh de tres ojos que ven el Sha'eil. Lo comprendí en cuanto me encontré con los primeros de los vuestros. Miserables. Rogándonos ayuda para destruir a los vuestros. Sentí en vuestro interior la llamada de nuestros ancestros. Sus súplicas. Su tormento eterno. Sabía que lo que habíais encontrado era un mundo ancestral, y esperé con humildad al día en que me condujerais hasta él».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Still." {n}Der Ton des Harlekins ist mild, doch es ist keine Bitte.{/n} "Es wundert mich nicht, dass die Wahrheit Euren Augen verborgen bleibt, dreiäugige Chem-Pan-Sey, die nach Sha'eil sehen. Ich wusste es schon, als ich dem ersten von Euch begegnet bin. Elend. Angefleht habt Ihr uns, Euch bei der Auslöschung Eurer eigenen Sippe zu helfen. Ich habe ihn in Euch gespürt. Den Ruf unserer Ahnen. Ihr Flehen. Ihre endlosen Qualen. Ich wusste, was Ihr gefunden hattet, war eine Hexenwelt. Und ich habe demütig auf den Tag gewartet, an dem Ihr mich auf sie führen würdet."
languages.original_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."

traits.locale_text: "Still." {n}Der Ton des Harlekins ist ruhig, doch eine Bitte war das nicht.{/n} "Es wundert mich nicht, dass die Wahrheit Euren Augen verborgen bleibt, dreiäugige Chem-Pan-Sey, die nach Sha'eil sehen. Ich wusste es schon, als ich den ersten von Euch begegnet bin. Elend. Angefleht habt Ihr uns, Euch bei der Auslöschung Eurer eigenen Sippe zu helfen. Ich habe ihn in Euch gespürt. Den Ruf unserer Ahnen. Ihr Flehen. Ihre endlosen Qualen. Ich wusste, was Ihr gefunden hattet, war eine Hexenwelt. Und ich habe demütig auf den Tag gewartet, an dem Ihr mich auf sie führen würdet."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ses çıkarmayın." {n}Arleken, nazik bir tonla konuşsa da emir veriyor.{/n} "Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh, gerçeği göremeyişin beni şaşırtmadı. Türünüzle ilk karşılaşmamda bunun farkına varmıştım. Sefilsiniz. Türdeşlerinizi yok etmenize yardım etmemiz için bize yalvarıyorsunuz. Atalarımın çağrısını, yalvarışını ve ebedî ızdırabını içinizde hissettim. Bir Acuze Dünya bulduğunuzu anladım. Bana o dünyaya giden yolu göstereceğiniz günü sabırla bekledim."
languages.original_text: "Quiet." {n}The Harlequin's tone is mild, but it is not a request.{/n} "I am unsurprised that the truth is hidden from your gazes, three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil. I realised it the moment I met the first of you. Wretched. Begging us to help you destroy your own kin. I sensed it within you: our ancestors' call. Their pleas. Their endless torment. I knew that what you found was a Crone World. And I humbly waited for the day you would lead me to it."

traits.locale_text: "Ses çıkarmayın." {n}Arleken'in ses tonu nazik olsa da, bu bir emir.{/n} "Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh, gerçeği göremeyişin beni şaşırtmadı. Türünüzle ilk karşılaşmamda bunun farkına varmıştım. Sefilsiniz. Kendi türünüzü yok etmenize yardım etmem için bize yalvarıyorsunuz. Atalarımın çağrısını, yalvarışını ve ebedî ızdırabını içinizde hissettim. Bir Acuze Dünya bulduğunuzu anladım. Bana o dünyaya giden yolu göstereceğiniz günü sabırla bekledim."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
